structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text:
In carrying out its duties and responsibilities, the commission shall have the following additional duties:
To meet at times and places in the State of Kentucky it deems proper. Meetings shall be called by the chairman upon his own motion, or upon the written request of a majority of the members;
To contract with other agencies, public or private, or persons, it deems necessary for the rendition and affording of the services, facilities, studies, and reports it may require to cooperate with city, county, state, and federal agencies in training programs; and
To promulgate reasonable administrative regulations relating to fire protection personnel.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 270, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 64, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 3. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 8.
